definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Does Glyn go to catch the man who has been selling fake potions?
sentences.chinese: 葛林會去抓住那個賣假藥的人嗎？

sentences.english: Did you know that a lot of online pharmacies sell counterfeit medicine?
sentences.chinese: 你知道，很多網上藥店賣假藥？

sentences.english: USTR expressed concern about the proliferation of counterfeit pharmaceutical manufacturing in China and Russia.
sentences.chinese: USTR已對中國和俄羅斯假藥氾濫的現象表示關注。

sentences.english: Up to 75% of the producers' profits go to pay Baidu's fees.
sentences.chinese: 在假藥利益鏈中，百度可以獲得75%的收益。

sentences.english: We see fake drugs less often than we see substandard ones.
sentences.chinese: 我們更多地看見劣藥而非假藥。

sentences.english: A coordinated approached is also needed to fight the sale of counterfeit medications.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還需要採用協調手段來打擊僞冒假藥的銷售。

sentences.english: In some cases, the only way to detect a counterfeit drug is through chemical analysis.
sentences.chinese: 在一些案例中，探測假藥的唯一方法是通過化學分析。

sentences.english: Ms. Plançon said that the police were discovering vast quantities of counterfeit drugs in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 普朗松女士說，在亞洲，警察發現了數量巨大的假藥。

sentences.english: The foremost of these is inter-country collaboration, since much of the trade in fake drugs occurs across national borders.
sentences.chinese: 首先是跨國合作，因爲很大一部分假藥貿易是跨國的。

sentences.english: Fake drug rates vary country by country, the WHO now says.
sentences.chinese: 假藥率因國家而異，世衛組織現在說。

sentences.english: The phenomenon was thought to result from the body being tricked into producing an effect by itself that would have been brought about by the drugs.
sentences.chinese: 這一現象過去認爲是假藥本身給身體帶來的誘騙作用。

definition: lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
to force sb to buy or sell/to trade using coercion
see 吃閉門羹|吃闭门羹[chi1 bi4 men2 geng1]
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom)/fig. to cheat/dishonest advertising/wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue
pinyin: gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4
